info.name: barnard59-formats
info.description: Support for various formats for Barnard59 Linked Data pipelines
info.author: Thomas Bergwinkl <bergi@axolotlfarm.org> (https://www.bergnet.org/people/bergi/card#me)

operations.label: Parse CSV on the Web
operations.comment: Parses the given CSV stream using the given metadata.
operations.snippet:
<> a p:Step;
  code:implementedBy [ a code:EcmaScript;
  code:link <node:barnard59-formats/csvw.js#parse>
].

operations.label: Parse JSON-LD
operations.snippet:
<> a p:Step;
  code:implementedBy [ a code:EcmaScript;
  code:link <node:barnard59-formats/jsonld.js#parse>
].

operations.label: Parse JSON-LD (Object)
operations.snippet:
<> a p:Step;
  code:implementedBy [ a code:EcmaScript;
  code:link <node:barnard59-formats/jsonld.js#parseObject>
].

operations.label: Serialize JSON-LD
operations.comment: Serializes the given RDF/JS Quads to JSON-LD.
operations.snippet:
<> a p:Step;
  code:implementedBy [ a code:EcmaScript;
  code:link <node:barnard59-formats/jsonld.js#serialize>
].
